verbs.description: [ARG0: The head of the American Federation of Government Employees union] [V: responded] [ARG1: to Trump 's actions] [ARGM-MNR: by threatening a lawsuit] , and claiming Trump was extracting revenge because he believes most civil servants supported Hillary Clinton in the last presidential election .
